description: Exact power of 3 that divides the n-th Fibonacci number (sequence A000045).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: If n is not divisible by 4 then a(n) = 1, if n = 4 * 3^k * m where m is not divisible by 3 then a(n) = 3^(k+1).a(n) = A038500(A000045(n)). - _Michel Marcus_, Jul 30 2013
example: a(12) = 9 because the 12th Fibonacci number is 144 and 144 = 9*16.
prog: (PARI) a(n) = 3^valuation(fibonacci(n), 3) \\_Michel Marcus_, Jul 30 2013(Haskell)a060901 = a038500 . a000045  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 04 2015
author: Ahmed Fares (ahmedfares(AT)my-deja.com), May 05 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 07 2001
